Aktivität Rheology Nomenclature (Society of Rheology, 2013) auswählen

The 12 tables in the 2013 “Official symbols and nomenclature of The 
Society of Rheology” document are the result of the hard work of the Ad 
Hoc Committee on Official Nomenclature and Symbols (John M. Dealy, 
Chair; Jeffrey Morris, Faith Morrison, and Dimitris Vlassopoulos) that 
was appointed by The Society of Rheology Executive Committee in 2012. 
The last major revision was done in 1984; this supersedes all prior 
versions, including the one published in Vol. 39 (1995), pp. 253–265, of
 this journal. In the course of their work, the committee consulted 
numerous prominent rheologists working in specialized areas of rheology.
 These tables of Official Nomenclature and Symbols were approved for 
distribution by The Society of Rheology Executive Committee in February 
2013.
